Package jchess.gamelogic

Class BoardAgent

java.lang.Object
jchess.gamelogic.BoardAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
jchess.common.IBoard, jchess.common.IBoardAgent, jchess.common.IBoardFactory
public class BoardAgent
extends java.lang.Object
implements jchess.common.IBoardAgent
This class is responsible to manage underlying "Board" (only) related data. It keeps the state of the Board and facilitates game-logic with numerous operations
Since:
7 Dec 2019
Author:
Sajad Karim
